document.full_text: harmon killebrew, one of major league baseball's greatest sluggers, died on tuesday after battling esophageal cancer. he was aged 74.
document.title: twins' hall of famer killebrew dies at 74
lines_and_colors: harmon killebrew, one of major league baseball's greatest sluggers, died on tuesday after battling esophageal cancer. he was aged 74.
